subject: Golf
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Golf Channel’s Kelly Tilghman said last Friday that one way for young golfers to stop Tiger Woods is to “lynch him in a back alley,” joining a group of broadcasters who have paid for their missteps about race.
snippet: The Golf Channel’s Kelly Tilghman said last Friday that one way for young golfers to stop Tiger Woods is to “lynch him in a back alley,” joining a group of broadcasters who have paid for their missteps about race.
